title: august 4: the romantic life of kermit and miss piggy
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the on-again-off-again relationship between Kermit the Frog and Miss Piggy, which was finally ended on this day in 2015. After, Maia revisits Elvis Presley’s 1956 hit rendition of “Hound Dog.” Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
